I see a lot of media articles confusing "coins" and "tokens". This is a pretty straight forward guide.  Coin = Has its own blockchain. i.e. PINK, BTC, LTC, ETH, etc.  Token = Rides another coin's blockchain. i.e. ERC20, XCP, etc (most ICOs fall under this category)
